meanings.definition: A person who opposes the addition of fluoride to public water supplies.
meanings.sent1: The antifluoridationists in our town believe fluoride in water is harmful.
meanings.sent2: Many antifluoridationists attend city council meetings to voice their concerns.
meanings.sent3: The antifluoridationists joked that they needed 'anti-cavity shields' to protect themselves.
meanings.sent4: The group of antifluoridationists stood strong like a barrier against fluoride.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the passionate speeches of the antifluoridationists at the rally.

meanings.definition: Those who advocate against the fluoridation of drinking water.
meanings.sent1: The antifluoridationists gathered to discuss their strategies for raising awareness.
meanings.sent2: It is important to listen to the concerns of antifluoridationists in the community.
meanings.sent3: The antifluoridationists organized a 'water without fluoride' taste test event.
meanings.sent4: Their campaign against water fluoridation was as loud as a thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: The determined antifluoridationists never gave up on their cause.
